name: Carb Up
description:
PLEASE NOTE: MOBILE DOES NOT WORK!!! Play in browser
Objective

Can you launch the toast above and beyond? How far can you go? Can you become #1 on our leaderboard?

Controls

Launch: Use the toaster's lever or hold the space bar

Movement: Use the left and right arrow keys to steer the Toast

Tips and Tricks: Collect 5 pads of butter without hitting the jam to get a speed boost! Use the wall for second chance to bounce and hit the butter!

Music:

Wholesome by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5050-wholesome
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
